message: I'm presenting for the first time at a conference. It's also my first time at PyOhio. What should I expect? Will there be a MiniDisplay jackfor the projector? Backup computer if mine fails? Very curious. :)

Ah, just saw it in Eric's email to speakers: "5. The Round Room has a projector that you will be able to test your laptop with prior to your talk.  Please take advantage of that so that you aren't fumbling right before your talk to get things set up."
If you want to try out your computer with a projector, and can come to the Ohio Union tonight between about 7 and 8:30 or bright 'n early tomorrow at 8:30, you can test it out...

also, the open space rooms have projectors, so you could test in a quiet open space room anytime.  I don't recall any projector problems last year; I think the Ohio Union's projectors are pretty conventional and up-to-date.
Cool. I'm not presenting until Sunday, so I'll take a look tomorrow during the day. Thanks!
@catherinedevlin I didn't get a copy of that email. Any chance you could send one to me? aezell at gmail Thanks!
